storyInfo: Unrest begins to spread through the camp due to a lack of supplies. Javier wants to surrender to the town with the crew. Anastasio begins to harbor thoughts about Aarón that he should not.

attributes.content: That's two arms, two legs, two eyes, two ears, one nose, all present and accounted for. Maybe a bit of a tan?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Thank goodness! You have you no idea how anxious I was when I heard these bandits were stone-cold killers who ate people for breakfast!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: And who told you THAT?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Do you know how much courage I had to muster to come here and rescue you? Weedy's still back at town. I'll get in touch with her.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Whisper) Whenever you're ready, I'll call her, and we can get out of here!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I've tried, it's practically impossible. Besides, I don't plan on leaving for now.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Why not? Don't tell me you actually joined up with these bandits like they say?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Whisper) Come on, out with it. Or do you really think there's a future out here with these backwater thugs?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...I have no interest in becoming a pirate, Elysium.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I'm staying because... I want to resume the alchemical research I ran from. This compass has Corazonix in it, maybe the last one.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Besides... I promised them I would fix it. It's critical for their survival.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: So... you plan to stay with them?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: No. Once it's fixed, they'll leave the Salt Flat for the ocean.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Then I'll stay behind and continue to hone my skills in both swordplay and alchemy.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Elysium pats Isidro on the shoulder. His friend seems to have changed.
Sounds like you've had a lot to think about... Well, that's not such a bad thing.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: So what exactly did the girl outside want me to do here again?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I needed an assistant as I repair the compass.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Just like back in Rhodes Island, then. Let me know what you need.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Isidro stands before the transmutation table. The probe in his hand makes a sharp sound as it swipes through the air, an Arts energy field forming along the lines that it draws.
He carefully removes the outer casing of the compass and places it on the table. The viscous substance inside begins to liquify, creating waves in the direction of the energy flow.
Arts energy and Corazonix intertwine into a golden light illuminating the salt flat outside through the gaps in the workshop walls.
The sailors have never seen anything like it. They begin to gather one by one.
What are they doing in there?
attributes.name: Peeping Sailor

attributes.content: That kid from outside is doing his thing, that owl-kemmie or whatever... Never though it'd glow gold like that though.
attributes.name: Curious Sailor

attributes.content: Lemmesee, lemmesee...
attributes.name: Peeking Sailor

attributes.content: Not gonna lie, this is pretty sick. What's that in your hand?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What's that in his hand?
attributes.name: Curious Passerby

attributes.content: Some beggar's magic trick, what else?
attributes.name: Scoffing Passerby

attributes.content: Oh. Well, nothing to see here then. It's not like we have any food to spare.
attributes.name: Curious Passerby

attributes.content: Bothersome brat...
attributes.name: Scoffing Passerby

attributes.content: Come and see my trick! All I ask is a piece of bread—
attributes.name: Young Isidro

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Young Isidro

attributes.content: Get lost, you're in the way.
attributes.name: Aloof Passerby

attributes.content: (Whisper) Bastard...
attributes.name: Young Isidro

attributes.content: Er, we're attracting quite a crowd outside. Does that bother you?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Want me to chase them away?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: It's fine. With you here chatting away, it feels like I'm right back at Rhodes Island. They won't bother me.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Isidro's hands do not stop. The probe in his hand seems to dance with the Corazonix rippling in the energy field.
His palms emit light, looking to the sailors peeping through the windows like a mirage born of hunger and thirst.
You ever seen anything like it?
attributes.name: Peeping Sailor

attributes.content: Way back when, I remember the boss talking about folks who'd perform tricks for others in the big cities. Guess that's what it looks like?
attributes.name: Curious Sailor

attributes.content: It's beautiful...
attributes.name: Peeking Sailor

attributes.content: Let them watch. Just make sure they don't barge in and try to sell me for food.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: ...Sounds weirdly plausible. Do people do that?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: People do a lot of things when there's nothing to eat.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Excuse me...
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: Do you have any food?
attributes.name: Young Isidro

attributes.content: No... will you take this ribbon though?
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: No, it's got to be something I can eat.
attributes.name: Young Isidro

attributes.content: I don't have anything to eat myself... I...
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: I happen to have a few biscuits here. Why don't you let this young lady see your trick?
attributes.name: Kind Passerby

attributes.content: Biscuits? Sure, since you asked.
attributes.name: Young Isidro

attributes.content: Metal begins to flow in young Isidro's palm, glowing with fantastical colors in the darkness.
Passersby cannot help but gather around. The disdain in their words cannot disguise the fact that their eyes are glued to the light in the young boy's hand.
It has been so long since there was something so bright on these streets.
It's so pretty. Can I take a closer look?
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: Suit yourself.
attributes.name: Young Isidro

attributes.content: The boy waves his fingers, and the flowing metal turns into a fowlbeast that takes to the air before returning to his palm in the shape of a fin, then a musbeast, then a burdenbeast...
The metallic burdenbeast runs through the crowd, shiny and chrome, leaving behind stardust in the air.
Wow!
attributes.name: Curious Passerby

attributes.content: It's just—
attributes.name: Scoffing Passerby

attributes.content: Oh, shut up and watch.
attributes.name: Curious Passerby

attributes.content: When was the last time I saw fireworks...
attributes.name: Aloof Passerby

attributes.content: I think it was a long, long time ago...
attributes.name: Aloof Passerby

attributes.content: Fireworks? What are fireworks?
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: The child musters the courage to reach out and catch a burst of drifting starlight. She trembles at the warmth upon her fingertips.
Impressive, boy. It's not often that the people here have something to smile about.
attributes.name: Kind Passerby

attributes.content: Just trying to earn my bread.
attributes.name: Young Isidro

attributes.content: Is that so?
attributes.name: Kind Passerby

attributes.content: Why do you have a smile on your face, then?
attributes.name: Kind Passerby

attributes.content: The probe guides the Corazonix, drawing a river of stars in the air.
More and more sailors gather, pressing their faces to the window, the thirst, hunger and exhaustion on their faces temporarily replaced by awe and wonder.
Now you're just showing off.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Did you think I couldn't tell?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: That was just a check of the alchemy equipment and compass. Now comes the next step: separating the rusted and denatured parts from the Corazonix.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: This is what I promised them... what I can do for them.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You two sure spent a long time chatting.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Well, it's been a while since we last saw each other. Were you sitting out here this whole time, boss?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You can stop calling me boss. All my friends call me Peludita, on account of how fluffy I am.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Oh, so we're friends now?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: 'Course we are! Could you have ever found your old amigo without the help of yours truly?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (Talk about twisting the truth.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Hm... so what should you call me, now that we're friends?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Anything you like! More importantly, what did Señor Isidro say?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: About, you know, putting me under his protection?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Oh, I forgot to ask. But maybe I'll remember tomorrow, if you ask nicely.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Please, o honorable Señor Pelirrojito! The greatest, handsomest Liberi of all!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Ooh, I like that. Keep it coming!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (You flipping finshit!)
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (I'm yanking that red bit right out once I'm out of this mess!)
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Well, I guess I do owe you one for helping me find my good buddy...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Elysium pats the girl on the head. Her youthful, childlike exterior belies the maturity, even cruelty, lying beneath.
You sure keep some choice company for a girl your age. Well, come find me if you ever squeeze yourself into something you can't squeeze out of.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I'm as kind-hearted as they come, after all!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Hmph! Who'd believe a show-off like you?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: At the end of the day, the only one you can trust is yourself.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Another one, please.
attributes.name: Hungry Sailor

attributes.content: That pancake... mm... another plate please!
attributes.name: Hungry Sailor

attributes.content: (Whisper) Have they never eaten in their entire lives?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: (Whisper) Isn't it all so very familiar? The pride, the gluttony, the greed.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: (Whisper) How are they any different from when they raided your granary?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: (Whisper) I don't need them to change.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Ahem... I'm sure you're familiar with Aarón, even if your previous visits have been, shall we say, less peaceful.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Still, I bid you welcome, and look forward to a productive discussion.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: *Burp*—
attributes.name: Satisfied Sailor

attributes.content: (Raises arm)
attributes.name: Satisfied Sailor

attributes.content: Did you need a handkerchief?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I'm good, got my sleeves.
attributes.name: Satisfied Sailor

attributes.content: ...Very well.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: (Whisper) Who decided to serve them fried garlic pancakes?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: (Whisper) Do you truly believe you can accept them?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: (Whisper) If it benefits the town.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Now that you have eaten, it's time to talk—
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Can we get some more of those for take-out?
attributes.name: Satisfied Sailor

attributes.content: Dinner is over. It's time to—
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Alright, you over there, no need to hide. Come here, and we'll talk.
attributes.name: Satisfied Sailor

attributes.content: Yes, you, señor. You're the one calling the shots, right? You can't fool us.
attributes.name: Satisfied Sailor

attributes.content: ...Negotiation is the calificador's duty. Speak to Señor Silver.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: How long have you been waiting here, Javi?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Since morning.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Didn't Teach tell you I had private business I needed to attend to?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: In all my time by your side, you've never had 'private business' even once. Do you even have a life outside this fleet?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: I never said I did.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: So why were you looking for me?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...Would you give up the compass, if we found another way besides going out to sea?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: I'm listening.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: The mates who got back from Aarón said we'll be pardoned if we hand over the compass and the thief. That they'd let us live in town, or go wherever we want.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: And you believe them?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I looked into it. The offer's real, at least.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: When? And why wasn't I informed?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Didn't want to bother you while you were recuperating.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: ...And who asked you to be so protective of me?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: How else would I treat the woman who raised me?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: It feels like it was only yesterday. Now you're taller than I am.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: When I was little, I used to pray to grow up faster, taller, and stronger, so that I could share your burden.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Guess my wish came true.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: You'll always be that little boy to me, no matter how big you are.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: But what about my thoughts? Will you still treat them as the ideas of a little boy?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: No, Javi, I won't. I know it's a feeble concession, the kind that only an adult can make.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: But I'd sooner die than surrender to them.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: How many of the friends you grew up with have already died at their hands?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I'll never forget, Señora Juana...
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: My crew and I did everything for them, when times were hardest!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Cruz, myself, and our crew fought the Seaborn to protect them!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: We spared what little rations we had, so they wouldn't have to feed on their own corpses!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: And how did they repay us? By chasing us into the Salt Flat as soon as the Inquisition arrived!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: That never would've happened to Cruz if they hadn't turned a blind eye!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I will never bow my head to those ingrates.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I love you, Javi, all of you, whether you believe it or not. Just as I loved all the mates who fought alongside me amidst the waves.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: They're long gone, but I still see them in you all. The legacy of blood works in such mysterious ways.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: That's why I can never forgive them... I hope you understand.
attributes.name: Juana
